summary: Provides a utility class that configures and executes a simulation scenario representing a perfect basic emergency obstetric and neonatal care (BEmONC) system for skilled birth attendance analysis. The class centralises configuration handling, logging setup, visualisation parameter preparation, and access to the necessary healthâ€‘system modules within the TLO simulation framework.
business_intent: Enable researchers and policymakers to model an ideal emergency obstetric and neonatal care environment, assess maternal and perinatal outcomes under perfect care conditions, and benchmark the impact of skilled birth attendance interventions.
